INTL_TASTYPARTY_TUTORIAL_ONE: As long as pizza on the first reel, you can get reward
INTL_TASTYPARTY_TUTORIAL_TWO: Brand New Slot, roll & win, max over 1000x prize!
INTL_TASTYPARTY_NOTICE_TWO: Use 3 pizzas to exchange Tasty Party!
INTL_TASTYPARTY_EXTRAGAME_NOTICE: The Jackpot Prize is up for grabs!
INTL_TASTYPARTY_RULE_DETAIL_ONE: To start a game, select game amount then tap "Start"
INTL_TASTYPARTY_RULE_DETAIL_TWO: After tapping "Start", the Tan coins will be consumed for a draw, and a random food combination will be displayed. You will be rewarded with a multiple of Tan coins based on the result displayed.
INTL_TASTYPARTY_RULE_DETAIL_THREE: Press and hold the start button to enter the automatic mode, and the game will continue with the current amount in the automatic mode.
INTL_TASTYPARTY_RULE_DETAIL_FOUR: By playing the game, the official bonus pool is continuously increased and there is a chance to win all the Tan coins in the pool if the result is a jackpot.
INTL_TASTYPARTY_RULE_DETAIL_FIVE: TanTan reserves the right of final interpretation for the event.

LIVE_CAMPAIGN_INTL_TASTYPARTY_BROADCAST: Super Tasty! %s won the grand prize in Tasty Party with %s Tan coins as a reward! I want to try too≫
INTL_TASTYPARTY_SPEED_MODE_TOAST: Speed mode is on. Enjoy your game efficiency!
